# 222

```javascript
// 首字母取消大写
// AbcDef => abcDef
const transFirstLowerCase = (code) =>
  code.replace(/^[A-Z]/, code[0].toLowerCase());
// 转换为全大写加下划线
// AbcDef => ABC_DEF
const transUpperLine = (code) =>
  transFirstLowerCase(code)
    .replace(/([A-Z])/g, "_$1")
    .toUpperCase();
```
